text: I use ap_get_client_block to read the http body in case of POST and PUT. I know when we use the "ap_get_client_block" method to read the data, the data is not available that point onwards to any other filter/module. But I need same data in the other module.Pleas let me know if any other information is requied.
creator: cprathal@gmail.com
jorton@redhat.com
text: It is the handler's job to read the request body.  Any other module which needs access to the request body should implement an input filter; the input filter will be invoked to read blocks of the request body.
Perhaps worth adding here (lest anyone stumble on this by googling), mod_request provides the requested enhancement.
